subject: Wrong Shipping Address
description_text:
﻿Hey, I have put the wrong shipping address but the correct billing
address. If possible please change ship address to 3071 NW Delcon Drive.
Thanks!
Order #SSN4909

conversations.body_text: Hi carson babst,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELR2435435243YQ

Yes I have received it, thanks!

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 7:38 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi carson babst,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
